TopicTitle: The KSP Community My Little Pony Megathread

Articles.Content:
Hey guys I\'m doing my new Doctor Who/MLP fanfic with my Time Lord Oc Marcus Xephos

A Brave New World

The TARDIS was spinning out of control as Marcus struggled to get up as he was in the midst of healing after his first regeneration, he stumbled as he came out of his quarters and looked in the mirror he saw a slightly younger face with green eyes staring back and jet black hair, â€œwell at least Iâ€™m not gingerâ€ said Marcus as he struggled to get to the control room where Jack and The Doctor were trying to land safely â€œwhatâ€™s all the racket about?â€ said Marcus breathing out some regeneration energy, â€œwe are trying to control this thing but weâ€™re struggling to get to a safe spotâ€ said Jack trying to control the TARDIS with the Doctor in tow, â€œwell I need to ditch these robes and get some new outfit.â€ Said Marcus making his way the the TARDIS wardrobe, pulling out an Akubra and leather jacket and black T-shirt and black jeansâ€¦

I have to say that the storyline looks promising... but it\'s nearly impossible to understand. There\'s no punctuation, or capitalization throughout.

I feel like we\'re being put in a jewish ghetto and not being allowed to leave.

A drawing of pony is relevant to a drawing thread, it\'s not off topic or spam and is perfectly legitimate :\

I can understand the metaphor to some extent, but that is a huge offence to my people as a whole. I don\'t want to spark a flame war, but perhaps reconsidering another analogy may be wise.
I couldn\'t think of anything else. It\'s definitely not holocaust/nazi related.

I couldn\'t think of anything else. It\'s definitely not holocaust/nazi related.

How about... cake?

It\'s like having a cake baked for you, but you can\'t eat it.

Was that so hard?

I don\'t see how it\'s at all analogous.

I do apologize if I have offended anyone.

Aaaanyway.... ponify ALL the things!

*Drawing not by me, but by a friend on another forum. Credit flyingchicken.
Needs more pony!

I feel like we\'re being put in a jewish ghetto and not being allowed to leave.

A drawing of pony is relevant to a drawing thread, it\'s not off topic or spam and is perfectly legitimate :\

Maybe without the nazi references, but I too feel like we\'re being made to stay in this thread and not allowed to leave. Yes, a drawing of a pony IS relevant to a drawing thread. Ponies are not 'spam' by any means. If they were, my 40k fandom could count as spam.

[mod]I'm going to leave you with this and remind you that the Nazi's murdered a whole lot of people. Some of those murdered were even my relatives. [/mod]

[mod] http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Godwins_law [/mod]

EDIT: I want you to sit down and think real hard about if you really believe that having a post deleted online is the same as systematic Genocide.

Have a nice day. Love and friendship and all.

Let me just hop in here and point to what Socket said, and say, 'Agreed.' If you have problems with the decisions we make people, take those problems up with us in private ok? Thanks.

-DR

If you want, i can make a list of forums, imageboards, blogs, and other websites where you can express bronyism in it\'s full.

Unfortunately, that would exceed my posting char limit. So i was thinking, how about you consider this thread a gift and an outlet for the bronies here instead of being unhappy that you can\'t use yet another site to dump your fandom on.

Cheers.

In my experience, bronies weren\'t actively pushing to have their content adapted into everyone else\'s mods, or consistently posting pony content in threads where it was not welcome. I haven\'t been very active, though.

What led to the creation of this thread?

What led to the creation of this thread?

The closure of the first one, as far as i remember.

The closure of the first one, as far as i remember.

Why was it closed anyways? ???

and why is everyone here unhappy
